name: Melody Project
description:
This is a shoot 'em up and rhythm game created for the Magical Girl Jam 5.

Play as Kotone Hibiki, a magical girl that must stop aliens called the "Noise-less" from stealing all of the sounds in the world. 

Disclaimer:

  • If the screen seems cut off, please zoom out with using your browser settings.  We made the game screen too big for some monitors.  Thank you! 

Created by:
